response.overview: The film revolves around an eminent Kathak Guru Bhawna Saraswati. When she introduces one of her disciple Renuka who becomes a star overnight and after having the taste of the limelight, the disciple chose to move a step ahead from her Guru, which puts Guru in the state of insecurity and identity crisis. Guru not knowing how to deal with her emotional self, starts dejecting “Renuka. This turns out to be a painful experience for Renuka. Bhawna’s Guru - Guru Gaytri Prabha Devi resonated with the emotional state Bhawna is as in her artistic journey she herself has gone through it.
response.title: Rotation
